headline: Software Engineer at Fullpath
summary:

Since then, I've obtained a B.Sc in computer science from Bar Ilan University in Israel. My work experience has included one semester teaching an advanced programming course for an Israeli national magnet program and three years of software development in the field of Public Key Infrastructure. In those three years, I worked in two different roles for the same company. In the first, I singlehandedly designed, implemented, and documented a number of specific applications to meet customer needs. headline: Software Developer
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
current_description:
• Project owner responsible for all phases of the software development life cycle, including requirement gathering, system architecture, design, development and deploying to production.
• Work with C++, .NET (C#), ASP Core, JavaScript, and NodeJS, applying multithreading techniques to optimize application performance and scalability.
• Implemented REST APIs, gRPC services, SDKs, and external interfaces to enable efficient system integration.
• Developed the core engine functionality to implement user stories, ensuring alignment with product goals and requirements.
• Applied best practices in microservices and software design patterns (such as Factory), implementing algorithms like BFS and DFS.
• Worked with and set up Kafka as a message broker to handle event-driven communication between components.
• Reduced development compilation and dependency issues by 60%, improving efficiency across multiple development teams.
• Improved system performance and memory management, reducing major memory leaks and implementing performance-enhancing best practices.
• Worked with and migrated code across C++11 to C++14, and C++14 to C++20, modernizing the software.
• Mentored and onboarded developers on both Backend and Frontend teams, providing guidance and performing code reviews, and participated in design review sessions.
• Managed MongoDB and SQLite databases for data storage.
• Collaborated closely with global cross-functional teams, including developers, architects, QA, project managers, UX/UI, and clients.
• Built a POC with Kubernetes, showcasing container management and deployment solutions.
• Standardized processes and conducted effort estimation to enhance project efficiency.
• Working closely with the company’s software architect to migrate software products to cross platform compatibility (Linux, Virtual Machines, WSL) and updated development standard in C++.
summary:
With a strong focus on microservices architecture, design patterns, and multithreading, I optimize performance and scalability while modernizing software across C++ versions. I have successfully reduced compilation issues by 60%, mentored Backend and Frontend teams, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. My experience extends to Kafka, MongoDB, SQLite, Kubernetes, and automating testing with Java and Azure DevOps.
I have developed GUI using ReactJS to create interactive, user-friendly interfaces and designed web applications that support user customization. Additionally, I have worked on developing custom mobile applications, integrating them with Monday.com for enhanced workflow management.
In addition to my engineering expertise, my in-depth experience as a QA Team Lead and QA Engineer provides me with a unique perspective and skill set that enhances my development work. This background enables me to approach development with a deeper understanding of quality assurance processes, ensuring more reliable and efficient software solutions.

The main application of the team is written in Rust and responsible for handling the clients database traffic (HTTPS based/ binary) and applies the Satori values such as:
Query manipulation, Resultset masking, Data classification, Inventory, Audit, etc...

Building the foundation & infrastructure of the Runtime team:
Development cycle - CI/CD, Helm deployment, In house python tool to support local development.
K8s cluster deployment with Helm.
Developing in Rust language (asynchronous programming, Tokio).
Private fork for Nginx and manipulate the Nginx stream to support the architecture of the Satori SaaS cluster.

Maintain & monitor production events, Participate in customer technical calls, fix bugs, etc...

headline: Software Engineer at Kahun
location: Or Yehuda, Tel Aviv District, Israel
summary:
I was always fascinated by the opportunity to build a “thinking creature” into a computing machine. When phones became really smart with lots of sensors inside and strong computing power, this was the best platform for me. Since then, I was involved in projects that aimed to make the phone into something more than a communication device, such as a tool that helps people with all kinds of activities.
After spending long years in various technology projects (especially around mobile code scanning, image recognition, etc.), I gained some insight into the main hurdles that prevent individuals as well as businesses from using such ideas to the full extent. Currently, I am involved in a product (or a platform) that tries to solve this problem and help businesses to put these technologies to use within their business. Such platform can help businesses to easily create mobile activities for a variety of processes that are currently done without mobile, including marketing activities and other operational activities.

headline: Software Developer & Data Engineer at Kaleidoo | Python, SQL, GCP, ML/DL
current_description:
Developed robust Microservices using FastAPI and managed API integrations.
Built event-driven microservices for automated Data processing and transformation.
Skilled in using Firestore and MongoDB for managing and indexing unstructured data.
Managed structured data storage and real-time querying with Google Cloud SQL, ideal for large-scale data analysis.
Orchestrated complex ETL workflows and data pipelines using Airflow (Python) and managed cloud-based setups with Cloud Composer.
Implemented version control, branch management, and CI/CD integrations for continuous delivery.
Designed real-time dashboards for impactful Data visualization and strategic decision-making.
Expert in crafting complex SQL queries for data extraction, manipulation, and reporting, especially within BigQuery.
Developed and deployed an API for face detection and recognition using deep learning models, managing both training and prediction on Google Cloud’s Vertex AI platform as well as on-premises. Designed scalable solutions for deep learning model training and inference, ensuring high performance and accuracy across diverse deployment environments.
Independently led a full-cycle technology project from inception to delivery, including selecting appropriate technologies, designing and implementing the solution, and engaging directly with the customer to understand requirements and ensure alignment with the chosen technical approach
summary:
I work as a Software Developer and Data Engineer at Kaleidoo, where I specialize in data analysis using BigQuery, building scalable cloud-based solutions, and managing real-time data processing for big data applications. My role also includes implementing ML/DL models, creating BI reports with Looker, and developing backend APIs.
I hold a Practical Software Engineering degree from the Technion - Israel Institute of Technology in Haifa. Additionally, I have completed courses and gained extensive knowledge in AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning. I am also a certified Google Cloud Architect.

headline: Computer & Software Engineer
current_description: I work at the Infrastructure team implementing different routing protocols in our Cluster manager and in Linux
summary:
I think what best describes me is that I love what I do. It doesn't really matter what it is, after getting into it I enjoy it and try to perfect it and myself.
During my BA in Computer Engineering I built a radial 3D printer as my final project which I found fascinating. This led me to my first job at IO-Tech as the main software developer in the startup for 2.5 years developing the software for new 3D printing technologies.
In IO-Tech I had the privilege of having the best CTO one could hope for, who gave me the trust and freedom to be creative and grow in however I saw best for the company. This gave me the opportunity of learning and expanding my horizon.
In parallel, I had the chance to start studding my MA in Computer Science with Prof. Yuval Kochman as thesis advisor focusing on optimizing binary hypothesis testing of optical signals with a photon detector, which was challenging (to say the least) but nevertheless very satisfying.
Lastly, in addition to my interest in the engineering world, I am as well a semi-pro photographer (see ik-art.com), I won first place in the chess tournament of Jerusalem for junior high school and learned the piano for almost 20 years.

headline: Computer Vision Software Developer at AR 51
summary:
Technion M.S. student with a thesis in the field of Computer Vision, specifically image segmentation using Deep Learning.
My Master's thesis is based on the use of the output from two cnn trained on different image classification tasks in order to create a generic image segmentation algorithm (i.e., segmentation without any semantic labeling). Drive the design, development, and maintenance of high-performance routing infrastructure to optimize online video delivery for network operators.
* Developed innovative components in cloud environment, leveraging AWS and GCP containers for dynamic scaling and high availability.
* Led the development of a globally scalable, multi-microservice routing engine in Golang, capable of handling millions of video client requests per second. The system efficiently directs traffic to the optimal cache node within sub-millisecond latency, ensuring seamless viewing experiences.

VP RD at ConicIT (1 Apr 2011 - 22 May 2025) [14.1 yrs]: Managing R&D of ConicIT, including hands-on developer.
ConicIT (http://conicit.biz) provides a software for early detection of mainframe performance problems and root cause analysis. ConicIT software is based on machine learning and unique statistical algorithms. The software also presents a graph for each performance metric with a green range showing the typical normal values for the same day and hour.
ConicIT can analyze thousands of performance metrics per minute, either from mainframe or any open system, and notify you whenever something goes wrong, together with helpful infornation about it. It allows you to find and fix performance and stability problems before your customers are effected. || RD Manager at Sparklix (1 Sep 2009 - 1 Apr 2011) [1.6 yrs]

headline: I manage your wealth and large investment capitals | Financial Modeling | Private Equity
summary:
Are you an Investor, Entrepreneur or Expert Professional? If so, I offer you a realistic and specific scenario, aimed at optimizing the management of your assets and liabilities, as well as solving specific stock transactions within the stock market.
My name is Danyo Chane, and as an experienced investment professional my value proposition is based on a single, undistracted objective: to create a solid mid and large cap management, trading highly liquid listed assets within a regulated financial market.
If your aspirations are...
✔ To own the management of your wealth within investments, through a team of highly trained and prepared professionals.
✔ To reduce risks (and therefore costs), automating processes with the most sophisticated instruments and constantly optimizing a high return on investment.
✔ Be a participant in our financial analysis (we study your portfolio, analyze risks through indexes, alerts and special protections and manage them in the best way committed to eliminate any contingency).
✔ Obtain economic benefits when stock market operations (previously studied through advanced statistical analysis) generate a capital gain.
⌚️ Then I certainly suggest you contact me!
👉 Are you looking to land your investments in the big markets? We set up a robust structure suitable for the stable growth of your capital.
👉 Do you want to establish yourself on the stock market? The scenario we propose to you focuses especially on the company and management of your assets for your business installation (local or foreign) in a solid, intelligent and profitable way.
📣 Send me a direct message if you want to know more and let's continue the conversation there to see if my process and strategy could work for you. Let's grow your wealth and reach your financial and business goals together.
